text: Has anyone managed to make a User/Owner Select dropdown? I’ve been scouring the documentation without any luck.

Hey!

• API endpoint to fetch owners from HS API
• Select dropdown where options are based on api response

Hey not sure if this is the right forum for this *feature request* but i’ll try:

In the new unified page editor, the cards added to the left sidebar I am able to display conditionally.
It would be very helpful to be able to do the same with the middle pane and the right sidebar.

I would also like to be able to use the same method to conditionally display an entire tab in the middle pane.

<@U03FJQPSC0Y> <@U05KNCMAE7N> Let me know if I should ask this elsewhere.

Thanks!
Yeah that’s unfortunately what I thought. I’ve almost finished up writing re-usable code. Will share afterwards.
If it is going to update a property you might look at just creating the property as an owner property and then using the property list to show the dropdown

I’m building some more conditional logic around it. We have an owner property that we want people to be able to change, but only if they’re currently the owner in that exact property or member of a few operational teams (not admins) and this is the best way I’ve found to do it.
Yeah definitely get that, I really wish the conditional property logic worked with owners...
